name: Oasis in Curses Prototype
description:
A turn-based RPG where you program your team with a visual constraint-based language. Inspired by Final Fantasy, Monster Hunter, and the engineering game genre, this is a short but challenging adventure for players who like to figure things out the hard way.

Programming and art by Jacob Bell (mysterioussoftware.com, artstation.com/jacobbell)
Music by Adrian "codeN1nj4" Norris (@DW_codeN1nj4)
